EmailTemplate.name: 201803_Americas_Email_JetWave_7X_Demo_JRD.201803_Americas_Email_JetWave_7X_Demo_
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Honeywell JetWave™ Demo at Clay Lacy Aviation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Valued Customer,
Experience Honeywell's premier, Ka-band, in-flight connectivity solution, JetWave™, as we stream videos, live television and more on our Falcon 7X on April 2 from 9:00 AM - 3:30 PM.
Clay Lacy Aviation – South Campus Lounge 7285 Valjean Avenue Van Nuys, CA 91406
While you’re there, get an in-depth view of the Honeywell GoDirect™ suite of services and apps as we take you into the cabin and show you how to maximize your connection speeds from anywhere around the world.
Honeywell's Falcon 7X is also equipped with the latest next-gen cockpit upgrades like SmartView® synthic vision and Honeywell's state-of-the-art cabin management system, Ovation Select® .
You don't want to miss this great opportunity. Schedule your demo today.
SCHEDULE MY DEMO <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CPQPM6K]]>
